alert.note: Alert for Chester; Henderson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 7:04PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Henderson and central Chester Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 703 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Jacks Creek, or near Henderson, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lexington, Henderson, Jacks Creek, Mifflin, Enville, Roby, Cabo, Middle Fork, Huron, Hinson Springs and Palestine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
